text: @MSNBC @realDonaldTrump the more you talk in your role as @POTUS the more tangled up you get in your ambiguities, deceptions, contradictions & lies.  Recommend you stop participating in the daily updates on the #Coronavirus pandemic and leave the time & focus to knowledgeable experts.
